info.+content: On a mission to save his friend, Sonic accidentaly sets off a machine that performs Chaos Control, warping him, his friends, and Eggman, to a world of humans. Sonic and Co. find a boy named Chris Thorndyke, who they befriend as they take on Dr. Eggman to collect the 7 Chaos Emeralds, stop the water-creature Chaos, and save the world from the Ultimate Lifeform.
"Sonic Drive" by Hironobu Kageyama & Hideaki Takatori
#3: "T.O.P. (Japanese edition only)" by KP and URU (eps 40-78)
#4: "The Shining Road (Int. Edition Only)" by Aya Hiroshige (eps 53-78)
"Event: The Last Scene" by Fumie Kumatani (DVD) (ep 52)
TV Tokyo's Sonic X Web Page
